title: Similarity between Ottoman and Mughal Empires

content.question: Which of the following is true of both the Ottoman Empire and the Mughal Empire between 1450 and 1750 ?

choices.label: The rulers of both believed in strictly separating secular and religious concerns.
The top administrators in both empires were chosen by a system of competitive examinations.
Christianity was prohibited in both empires.
Both empires were established by skilled warriors on horseback who came originally from Central Asia.
Both empires experienced a drastic decline in population after 1500 owing to the spread of diseases brought as a result of contact with Europeans.

content.answer: Both empires were established by skilled warriors on horseback who came originally from Central Asia.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
